characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist in pink jacket
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. A white sedan is ahead, and a motorcyclist in a pink jacket is on the right side of the road. The motorcyclist is moving forward and gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle. The road is wet, and there is moderate traffic.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the motorcyclist on the right side, who is overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right: A motorcyclist in a pink jacket, approximately 5 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist in red jacket
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. A motorcyclist in a red jacket is moving from the right side towards the center of the road. A white sedan is seen moving from the left side towards the center of the intersection. The motorcyclist and the sedan are on a collision course, creating a potential hazard.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down to avoid a collision with the motorcyclist and the white sedan. The vehicles speed decreases gradually as it approaches the intersection, maintaining a safe distance from the motorcyclist and the sedan.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A motorcyclist in a red jacket, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the center of the road. 2) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center of the intersection.
